author: ajsutton
content: All exits sent - still waiting for 1381 validators to even manage to get the exit into a block.

author: ajsutton
content: Will take until at least epoch 88660 to get them all exited (plus however much longer these last 1381 validators add)

author: ajsutton
content: Actually one interesting thing is that different clients clearly have different sized operation pools for voluntary exits as we're getting a mix of blocks full of exits and blocks with none. Not sure if that's because some nodes just ignored them entirely or if they just overflowed the operation pool and all the ones they had have already been included.
